body:
Comment 2: 
Fabs, Fmax, Fmin, Fmod, and possibly Fdim
are the exceptions in the math package: they
have a leading f (because of C) where most do
not.  Since the math package is all float64,
should these change to math.Abs, math.Min
and so on?

Russ
_Owner changed to @robpike._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
